awasan tharaga inoka senadhira, yasanthi kadawatha aarachchi, wajira lakshmi wijerathna, anula wijethunga saha sumithra wanasinha wisin winishchaya kalaha.jayagrahi kridikawanta jaya sanketha labadima sandaha adhyapana niyojya amathi nandimithra eekanayaka mahatha wisin anugrahaya dakwima wisheshathwayaki.tharaga prathipala meseya.awurudu 15n pahala shurathawa mathale wijayapala ma.wi, anushurathawa-bandarapola ma.wi.awurudu 17n pahala shurathawa- wijayapala ma.wi, anushurathawa-bandarapola ma.wiawurudu 19n pahala shurathawa-shri sanghamiththa ba.ja.pa, anushurathawa-wijayapala ma.wi..
